Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item is valued at $8000 by us, reflecting its unique features and unparalleled benefits. Considering its outstanding capabilities and the value it offers, I kindly invite you to consider acquiring this masterpiece at the same price point. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of enhancing your collection with this remarkable piece. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $8,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $8,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
